text: A good place to buy Singapore Mint products. The sales person is not pushy. They only show you what you want to see. Here to purchase the rabbit medallion. Online also sell the same product but at a delivery cost of $16 and good luck if you receive the product safely else it may be ended at door step unattended.

Shame on its customer service for Singapore Mint. I have visited 2 of its retail outlets regarding its stock status but both referred me to call the HQ which I did. Then I am told to send email, yet after 3 reminders... there is no reply at all. I urge collectors to be wary of the item that doesnt produce by them cos they may not bring in subsequently. Hate to be left in this situation. Really disappointed!
The Singapore Mint has a lot of beautiful coins for sale to coin collectors and people who love Chinese and Japanese memorabilia! I hope to one day visit there!

Just as the recent bad review written about the Singapore Mint. My sister has the same absolutely bad experience with them. She sent in the cheque  in order to qualify for the ballot for the Kim and Trump coins, trusting in Singapore Mint. She was informed in July that her ballot was unsuccessful but it has been a more than a month and she hasn't gotten back her money. She called and asked but was told several times that the cheque will be sent to her. But so far, nothing! Singapore Mint, you are supposedly a reputable brand name and yet what are you doing there with the long delay in the refund. Never again!

i am coming to singapore to buy gold coins and some gold jewelry for my wife ie bracelet pierced earings and anklet, what i dont want is over priced  slow inconsiderate sales peoplke messing up my  happiness when there. i read about them asking people credit cards charging immediatly then waiting for 2 months finally for the pay back and still the numbers wrong. WRONG WRONG,  So i am not coming to this place so they can sin and mess me all over close your store doen  go sell encyclopedias or the like.  "ewwwwww!"
